name: Slow Cooker Italian Beef Hoagies
author: Hunt's
summary: Beef roast cooked low and slow with tomatoes and piled on a toasted hoagie roll with melted provolone cheese and pickled vegetables is perfect year round.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Hunt's® Diced Tomatoes, undrained
6  hoagie rolls, split lengthwise and toasted
6 thin slices  provolone cheese, cut in half
¼ cup mild yellow banana pepper rings
directions: 5-quart slow cooker and large skillet with cooking spray
Sprinkle beef with salt, Italian seasoning and pepper; cook 3 to 5 minutes or until browned on each side, turning once
Add broth to skillet, stirring to loosen brown bits from bottom of skillet; pour over beef in slow cooker
Cook on LOW 8 to 10 hours or HIGH 4 to 6 hours, until beef is very tender
Remove beef from slow cooker and shred with two forks; return to slow cooker
To serve: Place 2 pieces of cheese on bottom of each roll
Top evenly with shredded beef, giardiniera and peppers
Serve with cooking juices for dipping, if desired
